description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Quick Draw 2 is finally here! Due to overwhelming popular demand, Quick Draw has returned to the Xbox, now with bigger and better guns than ever. This version features unlockable weaponry attainable through super-human reaction times! These high-definition arms are so fascinating that you feel like you're in a real duel! Are you ready to take on the world?
description.short: Quick Draw 2 is finally here! Due to overwhelming popular demand, Quick Draw has returned to the Xbox, now with bigger and better guns than ever. This version features unlockable weaponry attainable through super-human reaction times! These high-definition arms are so fascinating that you feel like you're in a real duel! Are you ready to take on the world?
